p: The essential oil yield of T. diversifolia leaves, obtained by hydrodistillation, was 0.65% (m/m). The chemical composition can be observed in Table 1. The main constituents ( Figure S8) are α-pinene (9.9%), Limonene (5.40%), (Z)-β-ocimene (4.02%), p-cymen-8-ol (3.0%), Piperitone (11.72%), (E)-nerolidol (3.78%) and Spathulenol (10.8%).
